title: Mobile Concept Mapping Learning to Strengthen Outdoor Scientific Observation Competencies [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary ecology terminology and basic mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: Field-centered learning utilizing concept map tools and observation recording apps in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can structure observed phenomena in outdoor ecological environments into concept maps to explain scientific relationships.
Learners can systematically record and analyze outdoor observation data at least three times using mobile devices.
Learners can revise concept maps based on peer feedback to improve the scientific inquiry process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
